name: Prisoner (itch) (DeacoZ)
description:
This is my first game.

Prisoner is a fun, quick, 2D text adventure game where you the character is in prison and must try to escape. Can you do it. There are items in the game that you have to collect and at the end it tells you what you achieved.

 HAVE FUN!

 Also this game will eventually become a top down game where you control a character and get Quests.
